mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calen_schedule(s_num, s_pnum, when, content) VALUES(CALEN_SCHEDULE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT MAX(c_num) FROM hcalendar), #{when}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT a.c_num, a.datetime, b.s_num, b.s_pnum, b.when, b.content, c.a_pnum, c.a_pname, c.fname FROM hcalendar a LEFT OUTER JOIN calen_schedule b ON a.c_num = b.s_pnum LEFT OUTER JOIN attachcalendar c ON b.s_num = c.a_pnum WHERE a.datetime = #{datetime}

SELECT c_num, datetime, s_num, s_pnum, when, content,LISTAGG(PNAME,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PNAME)AS PNAME FROM EATED_LIST GROUP BY c_num, datetime, s_num, s_pnum, when, content ORDER BY c_NUM DESC

SELECT a.c_num, a.datetime, b.s_num, b.s_pnum, b.when, b.content, c.a_num, c.a_pnum, c.pname, c.fname FROM hcalendar a LEFT OUTER JOIN calen_schedule b ON a.c_num = b.s_pnum LEFT OUTER JOIN attachcalendar c ON b.s_num = c.a_pnum WHERE a.c_num = #{c_num}
